name: hk inspired game
description:
This is a small game inspired by hollow knight, in which you have to explore an ancient city.

The game does not have a end, the purpose of the game is just to collects points placed around the map, there is 7 points in total, but you'll already be good if you can find 3.

Here is what i have done so far:

-3 bosses

-1 mini boss

-a metroidvania zone

-various buildings and ennemies

I hope you could try my game and give some feedbacks, i already made a lot of content and its not pretty long. Here is the kind of feedbacks i'm looking for:

-if the game is fun

-if the game is too hard

-if the bosses are too hard or not fun

-if the game needs a map

-if the game looks good

-if the game have some bugs

Later, i hope i could place notes around the map that explain the lore of the city, but my english isnt perfect so i would need someone to help me translate the text.

Anyway, i hope you'll like my game, i've worked on it a lot, and thanks for reading!
